First, We consider the first chromosome data from the 1000 Genomes Project and use a PSD model to fit these data. Then, we fit the PSD model with EM algorithm, and use the loss function as a stopping criterion. Finally, we plot the ancestral proportions of individuals using package ggplot2.

```{r}
library(AwesomePackage)
data(genome_chr1)
P <- psd_fit_em(genome_chr1, 3, 500)
topics <- order(colMeans(P))
colors <- c("red", "yellow", "blue")
structure_plot(P, topics, colors)
```
